title: Optimal fluid management in sepsis
body: Dr. Martin's institution, Emory University, receives funding from the U.S. National Institutes of Health and from the Marcus Foundation for Dr. Martin's research. Dr. Martin has served as a medical advisor to Cheetah Medical, Grifols, BD/Bard and serves as the chair of the data safety monitoring board for the MIRACLE trial in patients with MERS-CoV.
